title: School Management App(software training Institute)
description: Role-based authentication,Integrated Material UI to enhance the user experience ,Designed features like attendance tracking,notifications,fees collection and mentor note-adding

title: Book Store App
description: API Calling,Reseting password through Email,Authorization,users can search book by category or name,Add review about book,Admin add publish and unpublish the book

title: Quiz App
description: In this quiz app we can add multiple questions and 4 answer choices for each questions,Responsive Design

title: Netflix Clone
description: This project aimed to replicate the look and feel of the Amazon e-commerce platform,demonstrating attention to detail and visually appealing user Interfaces.
